comments:
Server environment was a fresh download of the eclipse 2.1.1 SDK for 
SPARC/Motif installed on a Solaris 9 machine which has J2SE 1.4.1_05 as the 
default JVM. 

Client environment was a Windows XP box running Reflections X 10 as the X 
server, configured to use Windows as the root desktop manager. 

From an xterm window that was opened directly to the server (i.e., not using 
CDE, etc.), I launched eclipse and it crashed while displaying the splash 
screen.

Interestingly enough, I tried this from an xterm window opened from a CDE 
session also running under Reflections X on the same box, and it came up ok.

The contents of the .metadata/.log file are:
